title: Jonas Johansson
subtitle: PROGRESS NOT PERFECTION
description: Jonas Johansson (1987–) is an anywhere-based artist, educator, and designer from Glommen, Halland, transforming light ✺ technology through ❋ play, community and (un)human intervention.
author: Jonas Johansson

meta.keywords: artist, designer, educator, light, technology, interactive art, audiovisual, installation
